item.description:
Cafe Paradiso in the North End worked great for the September 11 meeting. We will be meeting there again September 25 at 7:00 pm.

This time, bring a picture of Italy to share with the group and discuss. It could be anything. Someplace you went on vacation, a group of friends, the piazza from your hometown. If you can't bring a picture, that is okay too.

Ci Vediamo and remember to RSVP.

-Warren Agin

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: The Boston Italian Language September 25th Meetup
